tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I could not have imagined my maiden visit to a dentist, caused due to the aggravation of a cavity on the left side of my jaw, turning out to any more pleasant. A visit to Dr Mittal's is not your average visit to a clinic. The precision in her work, combined with a cheery attitude that includes some great music in her workspace, is what makes the whole process a breeze. Would absolutely recommend those reading this to not hesitate in consulting her over any issue that might be affecting your oral health.

tags: None
review:
Dr.Shilpa was very understanding and empathetic. She explained all the options available and let me choose the option  I am comfortable with rather than deciding for herself. 

The entire team is very particular  about hygiene which I have normally found missing at other dentists. 

Just carry a towel with you for wiping your own mouth / face during the process since they didn't provide anything when I visited. I had to used my own handkerchief.

I was also shown the x-ray on a screen and explained whyat the results of each option could be.

******** ** **** ******* ***** **** *****
reply_text:
thank u for your feedback 
the paper napkins are generally provided on request... but v may have run out of it then

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The initial fears of a dental surgery dissapeared meeting Dr. Shilpa. She sets high hygenic standards and is meticulous in her work, all the while speaking to the patient and getting them to relax. She followed up regularly on Whatsapp after the treatment. I could also feel and see her attention to details and zeal to do a quality job. She ensured she checked the quality of her work with xrays after the implants and Xrays. I now feel confident to  come from Europe to get my dental work done in India much cheaper, but without compromising on the quality. I faced no troubles or discomfort after the surgery and could start eating normally next day onwards, though am still eating soft food as a precaution to allow the healing go well.

tags: None
review: Shilpa , through her skills and advise has been treating my family of 4 since past 10 years. The range of treatment spans from simple filling to root canal and orthodontistry. Having spent 25 years in a transferable job, of which spent 18 years in Chennai, Hyderabad and Bangalore, she has been the best hands we experienced till date. She instills confidence and demonstrates her knowledge through the line of treatment. The ambience at her clinic and her approach makes us feel relieved. Modern application and technology she handles with ease to bring smiles on our faces. Truly, she works hard to win those smiles. Keep winning more smiles.
reply_text: thank u ! nice to serve a family with such lovely smiles ...

tags: None
review: I have been taking dental treatment from Dr Shilpa Mittal  for almost a decade.Needless to mention she is an able,skilled and competent dentist with a healing touch.She is highly recommended for Root Canal Treatment which is her specialized and favourite area.Her amiable nature and eversmiling approach, dedication & commitment to work needs to be specially appreciated. She has also performed bridging & capping of teeth meticulously & all the teeth are still in good condition which speaks the quality of job. I wish her good luck and all the success in her career. PP Sriram,Dy Gen. Manager. RBI Mumbai. (Retd.).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hereby expressing my gratitude for Dr. Shilpa Mittal who is the most humble and caring doctor that I have ever known. She is leaving no stone unturned to make sure I maintain my teeth for the past 22 years. Thank you Mam for the great work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very satisfied with the painless treatment n friendly Doctor..Made me feel comfortable throughout the treatment explaining every process clearly...

RK Sinha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** *** **** ** *** ****** I stay at goregaon but I make sure that I go to her clinic at Kandiwali only. No matter where I am in Mumbai, she is the one to go. She explains you the problem in detail and fixes it. She is so friendly that one can miss chatting with her again in clinic as once a problem fixed by her never occurs again. My most unbearable teeth pain have vanished because of her expertise. And yes she is very reasonable when it comes to fees. I strongly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The clinic has all latest equipments. Receptionists are friendly and helpful. I reached a bit late than my scheduled appointment. But doctor patiently waited for me till 10 pm. She is very good in nature and knowledge and experience. She performed some tests and X ray and explained me the root cause and suggested the treatment. felt better immediately. No pain in tooth even after 1 week.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
Dr. Shilpa is very welcoming and informative. I am satisfied with the treatment. She was on holiday when I consulted my tooth ache and she gave prescription via whatsapp messages and met her only to find I needed two root canals and of course caps. I chose emac caps with 5 years warranty. She suggest you not to use too expensive cap in case your tooth is not strong enough.
 
The clinic is clean and has nice ambience, follows the strict rules during pandemic, with friendly staffs.  For sure I highly recommend you to visit her clinic for your dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thankyou so much Dr. Shilpa. My mother-in-law 'Ms.Krishna Devi Bahety' is very happy and satisfied with your treatment. She was quite apprehensive wrt any dental issues and didn't want to visit any dentist. After your treatment, she has recommended each and everyone (incl relatives in Kolkata) to visit you, should they need. It was really painless and the whole process was done very seamlessly. I also appreciate your thoughtfulness when you informed about the condition of the tooth at each and every stage, so that there is a  complete transparency wrt the  procedure to be performed. Overall an outstanding experience. More power to you Dr. Shilpa in bringing truly 'winning smiles' in many many more lives. I wish you good luck and all the very best in all your endeavors. Stay blessed. Thankyou.

review:
We have been visiting her for a long time.
My experience with her has been good.
She keeps her clinic clean.
Her work is clear and she seems to have all proper knowledge of her work.
I went for getting my front two tooths fixed. 
She worked well to keep my tooth from root canal and went with ceramic caps.
The caps were made well and no one could tell the difference. 
My overall experience was good.
